channel.title: papers on Carlo Cavicchia
channel.description: Recent content in papers on Carlo Cavicchia

item.title: ongoing projects
item.description: my current research consists of: A general framework for implementing distance functions for categorical variables (van de Velden, M., Iodice D’Enza, A., Markos, A. and Cavicchia, C.) - Under review, arXiv, SSRN A new ranking calculation based on a composite indicator model: the case of the top 20 European football teams (Cavicchia, C. and Sarnacchiaro, P.) - Under review Parsimonious Gaussian mixture models with extended ultrametric covariance structures (Cavicchia, C.

item.title: publications
item.description: refereed journal articles Cavicchia, C., Sarnacchiaro, P., Vichi, M. and Zaccaria, G. A model-based ultrametric composite indicator for studying waste management in Italian municipalities Computational Statistics, (2023+) Cavicchia, C., Vichi, M. and Zaccaria, G. Hierarchical Disjoint Principal Component Analysis AStA Advances in Statistical Analysis, 107(3), pp.537–574 (2023) Vichi, M., Cavicchia, C. and Groenen, P.J.F. Hierarchical Means Clustering Journal of Classification, 39(3), pp.553–577 (2022) Cavicchia, C.
